questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
shift the equipment to another place where the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm whether the AC fuses are blown out
replace the fuses with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether the input voltage of 230 AC is available
check and confirm is there any carbon formation / breakage of power input module
clean / replace the power input module accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing power I/P Module

questions.question: check and confirm whether the fuses on power supply board is blown out
replace the fuse with a new one
check and confirm whether the input voltage to power supply is available
check for any loose connection / breakage of cables from power input module to power supply board
reseat / replace the cables accordingly
check and confirm whether the transformer output voltage is available
replace the transformer with a new one
check and confirm whether the power supply board output is available
replace / repair the power supply board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing power supply board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is any loose connection / breakage of cable from power supply to control board
reseat / replace the cables accordingly
repair / replace the control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the ml of syringe is detected when the syringe is placed.
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair / replace the sensor accordingly
check and confirm whether the buttons do not respond while pressing upon
, open the equipment as shown in the video, check the cable from keypad to control board for any loose connections / breakage of cable
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
replace / repair the keypad accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the keypad assemble

questions.question: check and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON, but the display is blank / plan.
open the equipment as shown in the video, repair/ replace the display accordingly
check and confirm whether the syringe spindle is moving freely.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm for any dust, dirt / obstructions in the drive
clean the dirt, dust /obstructions accordingly
check and confirm for any loose connection or breakage of cable from motor to control board.
reseat / replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the motor is not functional
repair / replace the motor accordingly
repair / replace the drive accordingly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
